biotools.summary:
Experiences of deploying integrated information retrieval and extraction services in a large National Health Service Foundation Trust hospital.

CogStack is a lightweight distributed, fault tolerant database processing architecture and ecosystem, intended to make NLP processing and preprocessing easier in resource constrained environments.
